message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share, but you still get a decent piece.
Your offer was a bit imbalanced, Alice. How about a more even split this time?
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a larger share to make it worth my while.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  We both lose out if this drags on. I'm offering a more balanced split again, meet me in the middle!
